concept.title: Stream Selector
concept.shortdesc: The Stream Selector passes data to streams based on conditions.

conbody.p: Stream Selector processoroverviewprocessorsStream SelectorWhen you configure a condition, the Stream Selector creates an output for the stage that you connect to a downstream stage. The Stream Selector passes a record to all streams where the record matches the condition.
When you run the pipeline, records from California pass to Stream 1, records with missing IDs pass to Stream 2 and any record from California with a missing ID passes to both streams.
